name: 6 Day Brachialis Rehab
description: Using Compound Movments for Brachialis Rehab

exercises.name: Cable Flye
exercises.notes: Low to High, crossovers to work pecs.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges (Glute Focused, Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Lean forward, tighten core, front leg farther out, never goes past vertical, back knee under hip
